item.title: React - Ideal Directory Structure
item.description: Personally I find directory structures like the example below are very frustrating when working with any modular front-end. I’ve been building React components for little over two years (from the date of this post), in this time I quickly learned traditional directory structures aren’t practical when building and maintaining React components. For example: - dist - src - main - web - pages - containers - scripts - templates - styles - tests .
